price: Na mkumbuke Ismail na Alyasaa na Dhulkifli, na wote hao ni katika walio bora.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ
footnotes: Na mkumbuke Ismail, na Alyasaa, na Dhalkifli - na wote hao ni miongoni mwa walio bora.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
